data.body: Algorithmically group open beads into parallel execution waves based on dependency graph. Uses topological sort (Kahn's algorithm) to assign wave levels. Gate-type beads serve as human QA checkpoints between waves. Displayed in a dialog modal with swim-lane visualization.
data.description: Algorithmically group open beads into parallel execution waves based on dependency graph. Uses topological sort (Kahn's algorithm) to assign wave levels. Gate-type beads serve as human QA checkpoints between waves. Displayed in a dialog modal with swim-lane visualization.
data.title: Scene bardem-vertigo: Wave Planner - Dependency-Based Execution Waves
